caption: A majestic mountain range emerges as the dense fog begins to dissipate, revealing its rugged, snow-dusted peaks. The wind gently sweeps through the valley, causing the mist to swirl and dance around the jagged edges of the mountains. As the fog lifts, the intricate details of the rocky surface become more pronounced, showcasing the natural beauty and grandeur of the landscape. The scene transitions from a mysterious, shrouded view to a breathtaking panorama, with the mountains standing tall against the overcast sky.
